Menace
When Scion of Calamities enters, exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play one of those cards.
Whenever a Mountain you control enters, you may aetherize Scion of Calamities. [i](To aetherize, create a token that's a copy of it, then exile that token.)[/i]
notes: Thanks, I Hate It — Simple Creatures
